thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Industrial & Infrastructure Fund Investment to issue units to raise up to 13.13 bln yen

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Industrial & Infrastructure Fund Investment to issue units to raise up to 13.13 bln yen

organizations.name: reuters) - industrial & infrastructure fund investment corp

text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Industrial & Infrastructure Fund Investment Corp
* Says it will issue 109,800 units via public offering and 2,600 units via private placement
* Says it aims to raise up to 13.13 billion yen in total, to acquire properties
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/HFuePN
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
